reviewText: This was a very unusual dvd. yes the quality of the video wasn't that great, but dvds like this one are hard to find. the exercises are unusual and there is a book that comes with it to explain the exercises

To me this DVD was made some time back, didn't have good pictures of exercises, plus it was for people who are already advanced in pranayama, He exhales so forcefully he makes an awlful noise through the nose, could put stress on the beginer. Sound and voice was bad quality. I ended up selling it, I watched it half way through and put it back on the shelf. It would be very healthful to be able to do these exercises but I didn't feel they were able to give good instructions
